h3.a: HCSD Schools To Remain Closed For In-Person-Instruction For Remainder Of School Year

div.div:

hr hr-custom hr-center hr-icon-yes avia-builder-el-11 el_after_av_textblock el_before_av_textblock

div.p:
This Is The Mission of Hall County Schools.
With foundational philosophies of continuous improvement and leading by example, we commit to utilize all of our abilities to accomplish the task before us. Additionally, it will take our entire community working together to create an environment where boys and girls, our most precious resource, can begin to realize their potential. We believe our role is to fully support local families on this most important journey.

div.class: flex_column av_one_third flex_column_div av-zero-column-padding first avia-builder-el-15 el_after_av_section el_before_av_one_third avia-builder-el-first

div.p: Submit the HB91 petition form to determine the Student’s eligibility to receive a high school diploma pursuant to O.C.G.A. § 20 – 2 – 281.1 based on the graduation requirements in effect when the Student first entered ninth grade. View Form

div.class: flex_column av_one_third flex_column_div av-zero-column-padding avia-builder-el-17 el_after_av_one_third el_before_av_one_third

header.h3: Common Sense Certified District Digital Citizenship

p.img: The Hall County School District has been approved as a Common Sense Certified District: Digital Citizenship, an honor that recognizes our efforts in teaching digital citizenship to young people and engaging the entire community in this important discussion. Read More..

div.class: flex_column av_one_third flex_column_div av-zero-column-padding avia-builder-el-19 el_after_av_one_third el_before_av_section avia-builder-el-last

div.p: The Georgia Vision Project organizes the resources and energies of Georgia’s stakeholders to effectively focus on preparing students to become contributing members of a democratic society and global economy.

flex_column av_one_half flex_column_div av-zero-column-padding avia-builder-el-24 el_after_av_one_half avia-builder-el-last

div.h3:
ESPLOST VI & Bond Referendum
“Building a Future for Students: Building Community”

div.class: hr hr-short hr-center avia-builder-el-26 el_after_av_textblock el_before_av_textblock

div.p: * March 26th 2020 Update *

In an effort to minimize the spread of the coronavirus, the Georgia Secretary of State has postponed the March 24th primary to May 19th, 2020. The referendum concerning the extension of ESPLOST and the utilization of General Obligation bonds remain on the ballot.
We encourage you to continue to use this webpage as a resource to educate yourself on both measures and how they relate to our district’s 10-Year-Facility Plan.
Thank you for your support, stay safe during these challenging times, and please vote with your conscience on May 19th.

Stan Lewis
Director of Communications and Athletics, HCSD

a.span: Visit ESPLOST Website to Learn more...

div.class: avia-section alternate_color avia-section-default avia-shadow avia-bg-style-scroll avia-builder-el-29 el_after_av_section el_before_av_textblock container_wrap fullsize
flex_column av_one_half flex_column_div first avia-builder-el-30 el_before_av_one_half avia-builder-el-first

p.br: To establish and foster a voluntary cooperative relationship between the school and industry through their mutual adoption of one another and to support and enrich the existence of both.

div.class: hr hr-custom hr-center hr-icon-yes avia-builder-el-33 el_after_av_textblock el_before_av_iconlist

div.p:
The Community Resource Guide for Hall County has been compiled to assist families in the Hall County area. This guide includes telephone numbers, website addresses, locations, and services of each agency.
View Community Resource Guide

Discover all Fine Arts events for each of our Hall County Schools. The Fine Arts page includes current and upcoming events for each Art, Band, Chorus and Drama Departments.
View Fine Arts Event Page

div.class: flex_column av_one_half flex_column_div av-zero-column-padding avia-builder-el-35 el_after_av_one_half avia-builder-el-last

div.p: We are proud of the fact that Hall County School District students perform at high levels in academics, fine arts, career technical competitions, and athletics. Additionally, our district continues to transform classrooms and schools to meet the individual needs of our students. Read Our Reports

Partners in Education, created and coordinated by the Greater Hall Chamber of Commerce, is a joint effort with the Chamber of Commerce, Hall County and Gainesville City School Systems. View Our Partners

The Honors Mentorship Program is a yearlong class for intellectually gifted or artistically talented 11th and 12th grade students who desire a challenging, enriching, career-based opportunity. HMP Website

Lanier College Career Academy (LCCA) was created in response to an increasing need of the Hall County community in the area of hospitality and tourism, including culinary arts, marketing, and business and resort management. The Oaks Website

p.span: The mission of the Work-Based Learning Program is to assist in providing a highly trained, technologically sophisticated and career oriented young workforce. This is accomplished by developing partnerships between business, industry, students, parents, school systems, coordinators, and post-secondary institutions which will lead the participating student into meaningful careers.

div.p: Tonight would have been #SeniorNight at our final regular season scheduled home game. We will be spotlighting each senior in the coming weeks but we wanted to acknowledge this very special group tonight. The talent, leadership, and passion from this group has set the bar. #FG

Our social distancing chicken clucked by to let you know our meal delivery on buses will roll again this Monday, April 20th. Use tomorrow’s “We Care” Friday to catch up with unfinished schoolwork, spend time with family, go outside, and rest. #Riverbendrocks
